programme.desc: After a girl is assaulted, two priests must determine if she was attacked by an evil spirit or a molester.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband’s funeral.

programme.title: The Beast
programme.desc: Two rival detectives compete against each other to catch the notorious killer who shakes up Korea by their gruesome murders.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: A myriad of Puss clones pour forth from the portal, each with a different personality, until eventually an evil twin shows up to challenge the real Puss

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: A gargoyle with ties to San Lorenzo emerges from the portal and Puss must help find her hidden eggs before they hatch and feed on whatever or whoever is around!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: Lucky and Bebe spend the weekend pretending to be besties when their fathers come for a family visit and reveal that they're old friends.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy
programme.desc: As a new term begins, Maricela and her horse, Mystery, arrive at the academy to join Lucky, Pru and Abigail for the school year.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When shark and pilot fish are separated it’s up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallop’s friend Theo finally comes clean on why he’s always rushing off.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag's scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippet’s Chocolate Chippet’s the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yip’s birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. programme.desc: When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.desc: A strange new kind of butterfly is pestering the toys in Toyland – just when the Queen organises a butterfly ball. Noddy has to find out what's going on fast !

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is given his very first kite by Mimi. It's very special indeed. He can't wait to fly it! But first he has to work out HOW!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi is shocked to find a dandelion plant in her lovely pink and purple garden. She didn't plant it there herself, so how on earth did the dandelion get there? Jess is determined to find out and in the process they work out how some seeds are transported by birds, some in the coats of animals and some in the wind. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see how many different types of seeds and flowers they can spot.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: The kids have a race to decide who gets to try some extremely rare berries. / When Scallop finds a beautiful and mysterious sea sculpture, she enlists the help of her friends to search the sea for the artist behind the masterpiece.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: The gang joins King Julien at his Lemur School Reunion, but the party gets out of control when his old prom date, Karen, shows up for revenge.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Clover wants to follow in her Grandma Rose's footsteps and compete at the dangerous Tournament of Doom, but King Julien forbids her to attend.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky rushes to complete all of last year’s resolutions before the clock strikes midnight on New Year’s Eve

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: The Killer's Shopping List
programme.desc: It tells the story of Ahn Dae-sung, a perceptive supermarket cashier with an impressive memory, and his girlfriend Do Ah-hee trying to fight against criminals by tracking their shopping lists.

programme.title: Second Shot at Love
programme.desc: A self-proclaimed rational drinker who got diagnosed with alcohol dependency reunites with her alcohol-hating first love and takes on a sobriety challenge in this romance.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: After a heart transplant saved Do-hyun's life, his father was convicted of murder and sentenced to death. To prove his innocence, Do-hyun becomes a lawyer and investigates the case.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: A poverty-stricken family cunningly place themselves in the service of an obscenely wealthy household who have been unknowingly harboring a stranger in their basement for years.

programme.title: The Fearless Hyena
programme.desc: A young man whose sickly grandfather has taught him a secret form of Kung Fu, starts to make a living off of his unique fighting style only to attract the attention of his grandfather's mortal enemy.

programme.title: Mission Possible
programme.desc: A trainee Chinese spy mistaken a buffoonish private detective for her contact. Together, they seek to uncover a South Korean gun-smuggling ring

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: Outer Man
programme.desc: An alien that looks like a popular TV character tries to brainwash the Japanese people into invading the Earth.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China 3
programme.desc: Master Wong and his disciples enroll in the 'Dancing Lion Competition' to stop an assassination plot and to battle an arrogant, deceitful opponent.

programme.title: Unlocked
programme.desc: A CIA interrogator is lured into a ruse that puts London at risk of a biological attack.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: An assassin goes to Thailand in order to solve a kidnapping case and finds himself chased by a man whose sibling he killed.

programme.title: The Anchor
programme.desc: Se-Ra is a famous anchor on a broadcasting station. Five minutes before her news broadcast is to go live, she receives a phone call. The caller, Mi-So, tells Se-Ra: "I am going to be killed by someone. Please cover the story of my death."

programme.title: My Punch-Drunk Boxer
programme.desc: A former professional boxer has a helpless past. After a diagnoses makes him reconsider his life, he takes his unusual boxing style back to the ring.

programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu
programme.desc: Diplomats from North and South Korea get trapped as war rages in Mogadishu, Somalia. With no aid from either government, they must unite with their enemies to survive.

programme.title: Royal Tramp 2
programme.desc: After being exposed, Lung-er is bent on eliminating the person who disclosed her true identity - Wai Siu-bo but complications ensue when Lung-er is assigned to protect Ng Ying-hung who is betrothed to Princess Kin-ning and Wai Siu-bo is assigned to be her escort by the Emperor.

programme.title: Dragons Forever
programme.desc: Three successful Hong Kong lawyers are hired by a chemical company of questionable ethics and must eventually make a difficult decision when their employer's motives become clear.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: NASA vigorously trains its astronauts to ensure they are physically fit, mentally strong, and as reliable as the strongest machines. But the fact is, even the brightest of people make mistakes...and in the unforgiving environment of space, any error, even a small one, can have life and death implications.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: Flying through bad weather can be a harrowing experience, and for NASA, it can be doubly unnerving, as violent storms can strike from below the atmosphere or above it. Witness the true power of nature in space and on Earth as astronauts and ground crews battle to overcome the elements.

programme.title: The Story Of Playstation
programme.desc: With video-games on the rise, Sony, the tech superpower would attempt a collaboration with Nintendo. After a shocking betrayal, Sony founded what would become the world’s most successful chain of video game consoles. The Playstation was here to stay.

programme.title: The Story Of Nintendo
programme.desc: From humble beginnings manufacturing 'Hanufuda' cards came one of the world's most recognised videogame companies and presenting itself as a platform for quality games and strong values. This is the story of Nintendo.

programme.title: Gameplay: The Story Of The Videogame Revolution
programme.desc: Gameplay is a feature on the history of videogames. From Pong to Pac Man, Super Mario to Lara Croft, Doom, Grand Theft Auto and beyond, we chronicle the remarkable story of the fastest evolving new media of all time.

programme.title: Space Disasters
programme.desc: In space, there are few second chances. When something goes wrong, it's up to astronauts and Mission Control to come up with a solution together...and quickly.

programme.title: Battle Of Midway: The True Story
programme.desc: An inside look at the Battle of Midway, the aircraft used on both sides of the fight, and the dramatic story of one fighter pilot and his pivotal role in America’s first true victory of the Pacific War.

programme.title: Battle Of Okinawa In Color
programme.desc: Okinawa was the site of the last battle of the last great war of the 20th century, with a casualty rate in the tens of thousands. Through it all, military cameramen risked their lives to film the conflict, from brutal land combat to fierce kamikaze attacks at sea.

programme.title: Aerial Africa
programme.desc: Observe a land filled with geological phenomena whose majesty can only truly be appreciated from the sky. From forgotten shipwrecks strewn along the coastline to the unexplained fairy circles in Koakoveld, Namibia's secrets will be revealed.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam Liaw catches up with a cousin from his father's side of the family to learn how he has been making Hainanese chicken rice for over 30 years.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam learns to make authentic beef rendang from a local Muslim family. He visits the National Archives of Singapore to learn about his mother's family, and continues his search for inspiration for his Singapore banquet dinner.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam visits Peranakan food legend Violet Oon's restaurant, National Kitchen. He then heads to Chinatown to visit Aussie Dave Pynt's restaurant, Burnt Ends.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam goes in search of the best seafood that Singapore has to offer. His journey begins inside the Marina Bay Sands resort complex where many celebrity chefs have opened eateries.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: In the Big Easy, Mena explores a charming host of plant-based Louisiana staples—vegan beignets, gumbo, biscuits and po boys—with food historian Zella Palmer and cookbook author Timothy Pakron. As an aperitif, he sips his way through a lesson in cocktails created in the heart of the grand city of New Orleans.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: Mr. Tanaka is moving places all by himself, so Team Zenko step in to assist, and learn the importance of asking people for help. / When Sam's skateboard competition falls on the same day as her favourite creator Ken KaBlam's comic book signing, TZG secretly prevents him leaving town before she gets the chance to meet him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: A myriad of Puss clones pour forth from the portal, each with a different personality, until eventually an evil twin shows up to challenge the real Puss

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy

programme.desc: When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When shark and pilot fish are separated it’s up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallop’s friend Theo finally comes clean on why he’s always rushing off.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Tag's scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippet’s Chocolate Chippet’s the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yip’s birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. programme.desc: Ghostbust a Move When Jimmy's dad decides to move the family away from Deedstown, Casper and his friends vow to stop Mr. Bradley from selling their house. My Fair Harpy The Winter Chill Dance is coming up and Ra is determined to be king.

programme.desc: Jess is given his very first kite by Mimi. It's very special indeed. He can't wait to fly it! But first he has to work out HOW!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi is shocked to find a dandelion plant in her lovely pink and purple garden. She didn't plant it there herself, so how on earth did the dandelion get there? Jess is determined to find out and in the process they work out how some seeds are transported by birds, some in the coats of animals and some in the wind. programme.title: Monkey Twins
programme.desc: After the tragic loss of his lover, Neua learns the Monkey Muay Thai skills and vows to avenge her death. His lover’s sister who practices Chinese Kung Fu, suspects Neua is responsible for her sister's death but later uncovers that she was killed by an organized crime ring. Together, they join forces to uphold justice and seek vengeance.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation

programme.title: Kasangga... Kahit Kelan
programme.desc: For years, Bardo and Julie have been casting dark shadows over many streets--he as a hustler, and she as a thief. One day, they are yanked out from their world of petty crimes and find themselves being groomed as deep penetration agents.

programme.title: Abandonada
programme.desc: After working in Canada for a long time, Gemma (Maricel Soriano) returns to the country and comes home to an abandoned house. She finds out that her husband Edwin (Edu Manzano) is in a new home, with a new wife, with her 4-year old son, Michael.

programme.title: Sisterakas
programme.desc: The childhoods of Bernice (Vice Ganda) & Detty (Ai-Ai Delas Alas) were world's apart, but they did have one thing in common: their father. Headed by the eccentric yet equally brilliant & talented Roselle (Kris Aquino) the competition gets tougher, and a string of events lead to the two company heads fighting over the once expendable Detty.

programme.title: Never Not Love You
programme.desc: It tells the story of young lovers who tries to build a life together until career opportunities sends them to a different country where their relationship will be tested.

programme.title: Mana-Mana Tiba-Tiba
programme.desc: Wilson and Uging, by the virtue of being the first two people who visited the wake of the late Don Segundo became heirs to a two-hundred million fortune.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends throw a party on the campus rooftop. When a prank kills one of them, they vow to never speak of what happened. Now, they're haunted by his ghost while the consequences of their actions follow them.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Mahal
programme.desc: Lira (Kylie Verzosa), a prize-winning author, spends a week to finish her final novel. But when she meets Andrei (Zanjoe Marudo), a young documentarist, her plans start to change.

programme.title: Squad Goals
programme.desc: Five boys finds connection in each other while dealing with school, love and family problems.

programme.title: Coming Soon
programme.desc: The movie revolves around the misadventures of six friends who come from different status of life. Monica, Darwin, Sikyu, Sab, Dana and Nacho decided to live their lives young, wild and free despite their problems.

programme.title: Boso
programme.desc: Jake (Epy Quizon) is a caretaker at a boarding residence that houses a whole array of characters. Through the holes he has carved on the ceiling, he has become privy to their most intimate and darkest secrets.

programme.title: Adarna Gang
programme.desc: Seeking justice, Adriana (Coleen Garcia) vows to take revenge on the family that killed her father - her target: the patriarch and his three sons Juan (JC Santos), Diego (Diego Loyzaga) and Pedro (Mark Anthony Fernandez).

programme.title: The Write Moment
programme.desc: A heartbroken writer tries to get back with an ex through his romantic comedy hugot script but fails and instead finds himself magically living-out the scenes he has written.

programme.title: Lastikman: Unang Banat
programme.desc: Disguised in his sharp green and black get-up he is Lastikman, a hip, young dude whose kind heart brings help to the oppressed, the defenseless or to anybody in danger.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S4 E04 - Avenging Angel
programme.desc: A series of challenging cases take the angels around the world to fight crimes, on behalf of their enigmatic millionaire boss, Charlie.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E04 - Abdullah
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Bewitched S4 E04 - Double, Double… Toil And Trouble
programme.desc: Samantha’s coronation as Queen of the Witches launches the Stephens family into another year of supernatural antics as they learn to cope with their young daughter’s developing magical powers.

programme.title: ALF S2 E08 - Something's Wrong with Me
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S6 E05 - First Do No Harm
programme.desc: In the sixth season of FRASIER, Frasier finally begins to believe that his life is going smoothly, for once. The rug is soon pulled out from under him when the radio station changes its format to a salsa -- leaving him without a job.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S4 E09 - The First (Part I)
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: North And South Book I E08 - Episode 4 (Part 2)
programme.desc: 1842. Two West Point military academy cadets form a bond of friendship strong enough to survive the forces leading to the United States' Civil War--forces that will rip their country into North and South

programme.title: Cheers S4 E15 - Triangle
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man, who may just be in town to buy her family's parkland - which is also the location of the annual Christmas celebration

programme.title: CSI S4 E19 - Bad Words
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: ALF S2 E08 - Something's Wrong with Me
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: History's Greatest Of All Time With Peyton Manning (S1)
programme.desc: Some names are almost inseparable from each other: Venus & Serena, Ali & Cosell, Lennon & McCartney. Join host Peyton Manning as he counts down the top ten Dynamic Duos of all time.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: Ancient Aliens is counting down the top ten most devastating disasters ever documented that might have an otherworldly connection, including a flying monster at a nuclear incident.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Since the dawn of civilisation, humanity has been fixated on predicting our own demise. Perhaps it will be asteroids, black holes, or something even more mysterious that will wipe us out.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5)
programme.desc: After the team's final experiment of the year, stunning revelations are made all across Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: At the height of the industrial age, as America's cities go vertical for the first time, a Yale educated medical doctor and Olympic gold medalist turns his attention to toys.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch (S1)
programme.desc: One ranch in Colorado has experienced sixteen cattle mutilations and over fifteen traffic fatalities on a motorway running through the property. Andy and Paul investigate to see if the two are related.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Most of the world's holiest places sit in plain sight. But there are some hidden. The revered tomb of Jesus Christ and a prehistoric temple in Malta with mystical properties—why were they concealed?

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: The dark origin stories behind some of history's most notorious methods of execution, from the guillotine to the electric chair.

programme.title: Somewhere (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A popular singer who was also the daughter of a judge was kidnapped by a convict he once sentenced to jail. But the act of revenge reversed itself when Lorna fell in love with her kind and caring captor.

programme.title: Silang Matatapang (Walang Atras Sa Laban)
programme.desc: Raymond Bagatsing is set to plunge headstrong into this action picture. His voluptuous real life girlfriend, Shirley Fuentes, is part of the cast in this slambang action movie.

programme.title: Bad Boy (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This was the landmark film that launched Robin Padilla to stardom as one of the biggest action stars in the Philippine cinema. Robin played a young man branded as "bad boy" for life because as a kid he killed his father in defense of his mother.

programme.title: Trabaho Lang Dear, Walang Personalan
programme.desc: Former carnival workers Leo and Amanda were trying to make a living by doing all sorts of jobs. From Dyesebel and Babaing Gagamba, Amanda was now a security guard by day and a nightclub bunny by night.

programme.title: Ngayon at Kailanman
programme.desc: Ayra (Sharon Cuneta), an heiress who came home to bury her dead father and who later discovered that her family's estate had been taken over by Edwin (Richard Gomez), her childhood sweetheart and the son of their former overseer.

programme.title: Dobol Trobol
programme.desc: Nino and Hero were dutiful, loyal cops. They were also inept and were the main headaches of the police force of Baguio City. It was the luck of these bumblers, though, to stumble on a major case which had its origins in China.

programme.title: SPO4 Santiago (Sharpshooter)
programme.desc: Bong Revilla, Jr, starred in this exciting film based on the real-life exploits of SPO4 Jimmy Santiago, SWAT member and sharp-shooter, who was idolized by the masses because he relentlessly went after hostage takers, hold-uppers and all sorts of criminals.

programme.title: The Sarah Balabagan Story
programme.desc: All her life, she has known how it is to be poor. So at a tender age, she gives up her youth and flies off to a far country to earn the money that she hopes will lift her family from privation.

programme.title: Bawal na Halik
programme.desc: Bawal na Halik

programme.title: Ikaw
programme.desc: The song, Ikaw, is the backdrop of this touching melodrama about a young composer and the love of his life. Sharon played a doctor who always decided using her head while Ariel was a composer who put his heart into everything he did.

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Manchichiritchit
programme.desc: The reigning Queen of Comedy, Maricel Soriano, met rapper-comedian Andrew E in this delightful tale about con artists getting a heart of gold.

programme.title: Wooly Booly (Ang Classmate Kong Alien)
programme.desc: Wooly Booly was an alien stranded on earth. A family took him in and a request to his superiors from another planet granted him an almost human appearance.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: We all have a superhero inside us, it just takes a bit of magic to bring it out. In Billy Batson’s (Asher Angel) case, by shouting out one word—SHAZAM!—this streetwise 14-year-old foster kid can turn into the adult Super Hero Shazam (Zachary Levi), courtesy of an ancient wizard (Djimon Hounsou). Still a kid at heart—inside a ripped, godlike body—Shazam revels in this adult version of himself by doing what any teen would do with superpowers: have fun with them! Can he fly? Does he have X-ray vision? Can he shoot lightning out of his hands? Can he skip his social studies test? Shazam sets out to test the limits of his abilities with the joyful recklessness of a child. But he’ll need to master these powers quickly in order to fight the deadly forces of evil controlled by Dr. Thaddeus Sivana (Mark Strong).

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 10
programme.desc: The spotlight shines on 20 of the Worlds Dumbest Performers. From an underwear clad girl giving a sobriety test, to amateur firework technicians, plus a funeral home Christmas greeting that will send shivers down your spine - these dumb performers shine in the roles they were born to play. Plus, awesome commentary from our cast of comedians, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 09
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin swim in the back of a truck, cook steak in a bag, and turn bike parts into a clock. Plus, they add coffee filters to the All-Star club, uncover road trip tips, and craft hacks to defend against your sick spouse.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 10
programme.desc: The guys give a taste of their awkward customer service at a liquor store, take tickets of humiliation at a deli counter, and try to get signatures to recognize phony holidays. And tonight's losers pay a frigid price in a coldhearted double punishment.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 7
programme.desc: In Vegas, an old rivalry resurfaces. Then, a locker reveals a covered item that's thought to be a vintage car, but when the bidding ends will the buyer drive away with a fortune or stall out in failure? And later, it's every man for himself when a unit full of gemstones ignites an all out war among the competition.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 8
programme.desc: A mega-find leaves the winning bidder scratching his head, but when the true nature of this item is revealed he'll be swimming in more than just cash. Then, the gloves come off when T-Money scrambles to scoop up a locker filled with vintage bar equipment. And later, Scott spots something he hopes no one else sees. If his secret stays safe, he could quadruple his profit.

programme.title: East New York S1 17
programme.desc: The 7-4 investigates the suspicious death of the patriarch of a neighborhood barbecue joint who has a close connection to Suarez. Also, Haywood receives an unexpected request from her father.

programme.title: Found S1 2
programme.desc: The team mobilizes to search for Jinny Coe, a personal escort who disappeared near her apartment.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 09
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin swim in the back of a truck, cook steak in a bag, and turn bike parts into a clock. Plus, they add coffee filters to the All-Star club, uncover road trip tips, and craft hacks to defend against your sick spouse.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 05
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin go undercover as they find out which hacks work best for opening a beer bottle. Plus, they discover new hacks for cleaning, throwing a great party, and using a ballpoint pen in ways you'd never imagine.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 06
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for popping popcorn and polishing silverware. Plus, they'll uncover the best hacks for working out and using dental floss.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 07
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the next level as they uncover the best hacks for cooking pizza and cutting cake. Plus, they'll show why bread is a true All-Star, and teach you some hacks that every parent needs to know.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 08
programme.desc: Our hosts find hacks for retrieving lost objects, separating egg yolks, and removing wallpaper stains. They'll also make duct tape an All-Star, find another use for walnuts, and show you how to hack your home while you're away.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 09
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin swim in the back of a truck, cook steak in a bag, and turn bike parts into a clock. Plus, they add coffee filters to the All-Star club, uncover road trip tips, and craft hacks to defend against your sick spouse.

programme.title: East New York S1 13
programme.desc: When the 7-4 investigates a fire, Killian and Morales turn to Dr. Ken Corley, a medical examiner, and fire marshal Nicky Greenville for insight. Also, Haywood announces a new policy.

programme.title: East New York S1 14
programme.desc: When a house party ends in murder, Morales, and Killian turn to Quinlan for help. Also, Haywood takes on an unexpected new role, and Suarez helps his brother.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 118
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on this morning, turn to Meredith Sheehan for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 118
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Casey Briggs brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Winter Special: Saving Frogs & Flower Gardens
programme.desc: Costa discovers how a sauna can save frogs, Sophie gets expert camellia tips, Jerry visits a grand cottage garden, Clarence creates a tower of flowers, Josh prunes fruit trees, and we meet a passionate lavender farmer.

programme.title: Great Australian Walks - Episode 2
programme.desc: Julia Zemiro visits Dorrigo National Park - her first ever experience inside a rainforest - and is showered by cascading waterfalls.

programme.title: This Place - The Creator Rests
programme.desc: Nguthungulli is the creator of the land, water, animals and plants around Byron Bay. When he finished he went to rest in the ocean in a cave at Julian Rocks. Norm Graham and Delta Kay share this Bundjalung story.

programme.title: Back Roads - Kangaroo Island, SA
programme.desc: Back Roads goes in search of all creatures great and small on Kangaroo Island, off the South Australian coast. Guest presenter Paul West checks in to see how the island is faring after devastating Black Summer fires of 2020.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 17
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 100
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.desc: With climate change pushing rice farmers to the brink in Vietnam's Mekong Delta, we meet two soil scientists who are using an innovative technology to help farmers adapt.

programme.desc: Ernie cruises the ancient waterways of Danggu Gorge, Aaron catches up with a talented woodcarver in Queensland's sugarcane country and Narelda tries her hand at natural horsemanship in regional Victoria.

programme.title: This Place - Gununa
programme.desc: Johnny Williams and Karen Chong are traditional owners from Gununa, Mornington Island. The community on the island respect the land and its history and in turn the land and sea provide for them.

programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Star Trek (2009)
programme.desc: A prequel focusing on a young James T. Kirk and Mr. Spock, chronicling their first meeting at Starfleet Academy and their first space mission.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: A Little goes a long way as Stuart and Snowbell set out across New York City to rescue a friend in danger.

programme.title: The Battle Of Britain
programme.desc: In the greatest air battle of WWII, Harry Andrews, Michael Caine and Sir Laurence Olivier take to the skies to fend off the German invasion of England.

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: Mike O'Donnell is ungrateful for how his life turned out. He gets a chance to rewrite his life when he tried to save a janitor near a bridge and jumped after him into a time vortex.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A hapless chauffeur must take a comatose Secret Agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. Following the sound to the attic, Lin Yue finds her own death portrait as she opens the door...

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: The family of a missing Texas mother becomes concerned when they start receiving suspicious text messages from her phone.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Shawna Forde was convicted for a 2009 crime that resulted in the violent murders of Raul Flores and his 9-year-old daughter Brisenia. She was sentenced to death.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: A violent assault ends in a fatal stabbing when a young mother kills her boyfriend to defend her child. Considered innocent by police for four years, she was re-arrested and faces up to 41 years in prison.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6)
programme.desc: A young father and his family come under attack at a busy drive-thru. Terrified of his aggravated assailant, he fires his gun and allegedly injures an innocent bystander.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: In Birmingham, a man's body is found burned; in New Orleans, a man with cancer gets a ride home that ends in his murder; and in Tulsa, a man visiting his son is killed in a jealous rage.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer — Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A Florida woman fights for her life when her estranged husband starts shooting at her. A young mother finds herself in a terrifying situation when her brakes stop working.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: People in charming Hope Mills, are on edge when a high school freshman vanishes while on her way to meet a friend. When she turns up dead three weeks later, the community rallies to flush out the killer.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: After years of torment, Nicole files for divorce, embarking on a new chapter that includes a risky affair with one of OJ's close friends. But a failed reconciliation led Nicole to a final, fatal stand.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: An on-again, off-again couple go on a week-long cruise to try and rebuild their relationship. All is well until the unthinkable happens and one of them goes missing overboard.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: In Cree culture, a promise is sacred. When Cree woman Shirley Soosay goes missing in 1980, her niece Violet promises her grandmother that she will bring Shirley home.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito pag-aaralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagbibigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent fractions. These also explain lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. These also talk about identifying the elements, comparing, and contrasting information from stories and how to write it. The videos also teach about words, phrases, and setences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pag- unawa at pagpapahalaga sa pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the motion of objects, sources and uses of light, sound, heat and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng mga pang-abay, pang-uri, pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang naglalarawan. Tinatalakay din dito ang pagsulat ng pangungusap, talata, at balita. Sa mga palabas din na ipapaliwanag kung paano magsuri ng mga kuwento at mga pahayag.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about parallel and perpendicular lines, angles, triangles, and quadrilaterals. These also explain about continuous and repeating patterns and number sentences and the concept of time, perimeter, area, and volume.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: In these episodes, adverbs, signal words, and graphic organizers will be discussed. These will aslo teach how to analyze a story and how to infer the speaker's tone, mood and purpose.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito naipamamalas ang pang- unawa sa bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan sa lipunan, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng bansa.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the force that can change the shape, size or movement of objects and how light, heat and sound travel using various objects.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang may lapi, at iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap. Pag-aaralan din dito ang pagbibigay ng lagom, pagsusuri ng pahayag, at pagkuha ng impormasyon sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about understanding of solid figures, sequence in forming rules, expressions and equations. These also talk about rate and speed, and of area and surface area of plane and solid or space figures.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about presenting reports on different viewpoints and evaluating narratives.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito pag-uusapan ang mas malalim na pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa pagpupunyagi ng mga Pilipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga suliranin, isyu at hamon ng kasarinlan.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes focus on gravity and friction affect movement of objects and how energy is transformed in simple machines.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri at paghahambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan. Pag-aaralan din dito ang tungkol sa mga estratehiya sa pagkuha ng impormasyon, sa wastong paggamit ng impormal na komunikasyon at angkop na ekspresyon sa pagbabahagi ng ideya o ipinyon tungkol sa mga tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of axiomatic structure of geometry and triangle congruence.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes examines biases and propagandas. These also teach about using parallelism and cohesive devices in different types of speech.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa naging transpormasyon tungo sa makabagong panahon ng mga bansa at rehiyon sa daigdig bunsod ng paglaganap ng mga kaisipan sa agham, politika, at ekonomiya tungo sa pagbuo ng pandaigdigan kamalayan.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes are about the particle nature of matter as basis for explaining properties, physical changes, and structure of substances and mixtures. These also talk about the identity of a substance according to its atomic structure and the periodic table of elements as an organizing tool to determine the chemical properties of elements.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang uri ng panitikan at sa pagsusulat at pagsusuri ng mga ito. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang paggamit ng wastong mga pahayag at angkop na mga salita sa pagsusulat ng reaksiyon sa mga teksto at napanood na video.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of combinatorics and probability.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different techniques in writing, how to compose and critique it.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa malikhaing hakbang na nagsusulong ng pagtanggap at paggalang sa iba’t ibang kasarian upang maitaguyod ang pagkakapantay- pantay ng tao bilang kasapi ng pamayanan.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episode talk about the organisms as having feedback mechanisms and how these feedback mechanisms help the organism maintain homeostasis. These also explain how information is stored in DNA, how changes in a DNA molecule may cause changes in its products, how mutations that occur, and how evolution through natural selection can result in biodiversity. These also focus on the influence of biodiversity on the stability of ecosystems.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes feature the life of learners under alternative learning system. These episodes also focus on the process of pla ing, setting up, ru ing a small business, and these also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the concept of a family, school, and community. These also teach about letter names and sounds and different vocabularies about the environment.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pabula at alamat at ang pagkasunod-sunod ng mga pangyayari nito. Ipapakita rin dito ang wastong paggamit ng magagalang na pananalita, pangngalan, malalaki at maliliit na Letra. ituturo din dito ang pagbasa at pagbilang ng mga pantig.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about addition and subtraction of whole numbers up to 100 including money.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about action words and describing words. These videos also discuss about following and giving one to two step directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapakita ang pag- unawa at pagpapahalaga sa sariling pamilya at mga kasapi nito at bahaging ginagampanan ng bawat isa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang elemento at bahagi ng kuwento. Ituturo din dito ang paghihinuha at pagbibigay ng susunod na pangyayari sa kuwento.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about subtraction and multiplication of whole numbers up to 1000 including money.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These videos teach about the different parts of the book and its uses. These episodes also talk about words with short vowels and action words.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ituturo ang pag- unawa sa kuwento ng pinagmulan ng sariling komunidad batay sa konsepto ng pagbabago at pagpapatuloy at pagpapahalaga sa kulturang nabuo ng komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa paggamit ng magagalang na pananalita, salitang naglalarawan, at angkop na tanong. Ituturo din dito ang salitang magkatugma, pagkukumpara ng kuwento at pagbibigay ng wakas dito.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach multiplication and division of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: The videos talk about verbs, pronouns, consonant blends, and digraphs. These episodes also discuss different sources of information and identifying fact from opinion.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapakita ang pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga ng iba’t ibang kwento at mga sagisag na naglalarawan ng sariling lalawigan at mga karatig lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about parts, and functions of the sense organs of the human body; parts and functions of animals and importance to humans; external parts of plants and their functions, and importance to humans; characteristics of living and nonliving things and the basic needs of plants, animals and humans.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes feature the life of learners under alternative learning system. These episodes also focus on the process of pla ing, setting up, ru ing a small business, and these also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. These videos also discuss children's ability to take care of oneself and understating the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinuturo ang tungkol sa pagbabay, panghalip, pangngalan, at salitang naglalarawan. Tinatalakay din dito ang tungkol sa pagtukoy ng sariling ideya at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggang kuwento.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about fractions 1⁄2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures. These also talk about continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about polite expressions and how to talk about oneself, one’s family and one’s personal experiences

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapakita ang pag- unawa sa kahalagahan ng pagkilala ng mga batayang impormasyon ng pisikal na kapaligiran ng sariling paaralan at ng mga taong bumubuo dito na nakakatulong sa paghubog ng kakayahan ng bawat batang mag-aaral.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay nagtuturo tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay. Tinatalakay din dito ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about division of whole numbers up to 1000 including money and unit fractions. These also explain about straight and curved lines, flat and curved surfaces and basic shapes and continuous patterns using two attributes.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about word clines, synonyms, and antonyms. These also talk identifying major points and key themes, and the difference between made-up and real in texts.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapakita ang kahalagahan ng mabuting paglilingkod ng mga namumuno sa pagsulong ng mga pangunahing hanapbuhay at pagtugon sa pangangailangan ng mga kasapi ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito pag-aaralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagbibigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.
